column4: i am using ubuntu 11.04 beta2 updated. i had the same problem on ubuntu 10.10. i can not read/write the files which shared by "windows 7" on the same local newtork (home). Ubuntu can see the computer, it ask me the password, but it can not connect and it ask me again the password. can someone help me please ?
nobody here seems to know much about samba or they would have answered
google/check the forums for "samba" which is linux support for windows shares
